title: Center selected envelope content and update text to “1j6s3j2”

requirements.summary: Update only the two specified DOM elements so the “65b0” content is centered within its container and the visible text becomes exactly “1j6s3j2”.
acceptanceCriteria: Within the area corresponding to /main/div/div[4], the selected inner element (/div[3]) is visually centered (horizontally; and vertically if applicable to that container).
The displayed text/content for the selected inner element is exactly “1j6s3j2”.
No other elements outside the two provided XPaths are modified (no unintended layout/text changes elsewhere in the scene).

file_operations.description: Modify ONLY the two JSX elements that correspond to the provided XPaths: (1) the 'Main content' wrapper div (matching /main/div/div[4]) and (2) the envelope 'Content' absolute div (the 3rd child div inside the envelope container, matching .../div[3]). Ensure the inner 'Content' div uses centering layout (horizontal and vertical as applicable) and replace the currently displayed “65b0” content so the visible text is exactly “1j6s3j2”, without changing any other DOM outside these two elements.
